items.text: yummy chicken
Better than KFC!!
Usually have a que during peak meal times. Wait time abt 30-45mins. Spring chix tasty but a lot of fats and oily. Fries n coleslaw nice. Not a place for healthy eating. Staff not tat friendly.
The spring chicken is a must try! Order a whole piece & split it among 2-3 friends. Totally worth the price ^^(b)
The waiting is like F**k especially those who finished eating still TMD sit there n talk cock. Move ur ass n keep the q moving man.
Best Fried Chicken in town! Get the Spring Chicken set deal~worth every value!
Come with lots of patience as you're most likely gonna wait between 15-30 minutes to get in, especially during peak hours.
Service seems to have become slower after they made it self service :(
Love d aroma...
Especially Love the mashed potato & fried bun! Yummeyy!
Directions. Just take the escalator from the first floor main entrance (facing Geylang Rd) & restaurant is immediately to your right
Probably the best fried chicken in Singapore
Move over KFC and Popeye's. Arnold's serves the the best freshest fried chicken, mash & coleslaw among all Halal fried chicken restaurants!
Governor of California Chicken
The real fast food
The spring chickens are to die for....
Fried chicken duh
Ok. Not bad
Very nice fried chicken, very light and delicate, from the chicken to the fries to the cole slaw, all light and delicate and great!
Try the spring chicken.. Very juicy and tender.
Must try chicken. Not oily and very chrispy. KFC stand aside
I prefer the 2-3 piece plate rather than spring chicken set! Yums!
get the full spring chicken a la carte!! one of the best fried chickens you can find in singapore
Their rootbeer float fried chicken n potato platter r my all time fave
To everyone who has raved about this, go try Chicken Up. Seriously, this is just bad.
It gets crowded. You have to queue for a seat. Takeaway is much faster. Go for the 2pc fried chicken meal! I enjoy their batter and natural-tasting chicken over KFC or Popeye's.
Only the fried chicken,potato chips n squid rings r nice...
the best chicken ever! potato platter is a must try. don't forget the cheddar cheese!! :)
The chicken taste and standard has drop quite a lot. I've been a big fan of Arnolds since I was a kid, now to me this place is the same like the other fried chicken restaurant. Haizzz....
Good try.... Nice food
Biz is good, long queue, gd service. Tried whipped potato, coleslaw & spring chicken, chicken leg. Though meat is tender but sad to say it's not tasty/juicy. There's a chicky smell that I don't like.
Good chicken. Mediocre sides. Awful seating arrangements, lack of queue system after so long. Felt so lost during my first time there.
Try the spring chicken, u will nv regret !!!
Here's a tip: don't come here. Service is slow, chicken is nothing to shout about and unless you like garlic A LOT you'll hate it. Even my mug root beer was watered down. So glad I didn't queue today
Fried chicken still remain the softness after fried... :p
Best spring chicken in town!!!!
Half spring chix set is all worth it for $5.90 though it used to be $5.50. Beats KFC anytime for its tenderness.
Best tasteful chicken ever! You will like it. Yum yum!
Only the city plaza branch is GOOD
Excellent fast food fried chicken. Much better than KFC.
The juiciest tender spring chicken soaked with OIL..! Its totally unhealthy but once in a blue blue moon is fine..sinful savourings!
Try their signature dish and the potato platter! Very nice!
Don't go for the spring chicken. Just have the parts.
The real,sarap to the bones!
Long Que is normal here... But it's fine once you dine..😊
1/2 Spring Chicken @ Arnold's Fried Chicken Singapore
Finger dirty but tummy filling good!
Best chicken! =) Try also the potato platter.. =)
Best fried chicken in Singapore!
Darn crispy chicken! Not too oily.
Annoying staff here specially the girl who look like a boy
Must order at the counter first. If there is a long queue, u are only required to make payment when there is a seat for you.
Famous for its chicken.. Its yummylicious... Yum2 :D
It makes KFC overrated.
Best fried chicken there is. Even better then kfc. Potatoe platter is a must order
Arnold's win every fried chicken joint in sg. Hands down
Go for the half piece chicken . Request for the heavenly juicy thigh. They are so heavenly delectable 
tasty chicken..must try potato platter...yummy
The best Fried Chicken ever! Love their buns and potato platter too!
Spring chicken yeah
Getting too complacent due the queues. Poor service. Bad food.
Getting too complacent due the queues. Poor service & bad food
Try the Fried Chicken, Coleslaw And Fries - Menggemukkan!!!
The 0.50 charges for per changes of chicken part is a rip off!!!!
Step aside KFC and Popeye's. Arnold's serves the best tasting, freshest, juiciest chicken in Singapore! Makes you keep coming back for more! Lezat!
I like it very much. Highly recommended. Less expensive too.
Good recommendation
Aside from the chicken, this place has the best coleslaw of all!
the fried chicken is awesome!
Way better than KFCs in Singapore. This is standard good quality fried chicken, that you MUST try. Note that you may wait up to an hour to get a seat.
the cashier is a moron
Awesome chicken! And that juice u see coming out from the fried chicken, they really are juice and not totally oil! Yummy!
Expect to wait at least 30min during dinner time
Best crispy succulent chicken.great cool coleslaw. 9/10
Good smell, good food, good service! But abit slow lah.
The fried chicken is not too oily compared to KFC. Quite nice.
Arnolds chicken can beat KFC anytime
Super long queue on a weekend. Gonna wait an hour.
Dinner at Arnold's - On a Sunday evening, the wait was just over an hour.  But the fried chicken was very good and pretty much straight out of the fryer.
Try the 2 piece platter meal, so much better than KF*, some say is the best in singapore & jb and some say Batam!! whahahaha!
Best fried chicken! Its better than kfc!
Nothing beats their spring chicken. Go get one whole of it. :))
Fried Chicken? Only Arnold's.. Q starts as early as 6pm.. They will allocate the seats for you so don't try to change seats the not so friendly staffs will make noise. 😁
Order at counter. Pay when ur queue no. shows up on screen. Get ur seats and enjoy the awesome fried chickens. Their cheesy dips are great with their waffle fries.
